backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence reports linking feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and themes defining light and dark color systems and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app at the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the ArtistLeaderboardPage with global styles.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Arti: Renders a responsive artist leaderboard row with avatar, rank, score, and trend shift indicator.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Hype: Displays a small flame-themed badge highlighting top-trending artists.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Wraps the leaderboard header and maps artists into ArtistRow components.
Desktop-only header labeling Rank, Artist, Reach Score, and Trend columns.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Rank: Shows an up, down, or neutral indicator based on score movement.
frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSampl: Provides sample artist leaderboard data with ranks, scores, and trending flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including mandala background utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistLeaderboardPage: Renders the Artist Leaderboard page with mandala background, header, leaderboard component, and themed footer.
frontend/src/types/leaderboard.ts: Declares the Artist interface describing leaderboard artist data fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, radii, animations, and plugin extensions tied to CSS variable themes.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and notes about shifting the leaderboardâ€™s visual theme toward a light blue background.
